loadingDataArray.title: The past and destiny
loadingDataArray.text: You can never move forward if you don't move on.

loadingDataArray.title: The world
loadingDataArray.text: In this world, you will meet allies who will fight by your side.

loadingDataArray.title: Patients
loadingDataArray.text: The ill have not yet awakened to who they are.

loadingDataArray.title: Red threads
loadingDataArray.text: The red threads bind our future, present and past.
